Package io.micronaut.core.convert

Interface TypeConverterRegistrar

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotationConvertersRegistrar, ContextConverterRegistrar, HttpConverterRegistrar, HttpServerTypeConvertersRegistrar, HttpTypeConverterRegistrar, JacksonConverterRegistrar, JsonConverterRegistrar, KQueueChannelOptionFactory, LoadBalancerConverters, LoggingConverterRegistrar, NettyByteBufferConverters, NettyConverters, NettyConvertersSpi, ReactiveTypeConverterRegistrar, SharedHttpConvertersRegistrar, TimeConverterRegistrar
@Indexed(TypeConverterRegistrar.class) public interface TypeConverterRegistrar
An interface for classes that register type conversions with the ConversionService.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
